title: Bunny Drop, Vol. 1
description: Going home for his grandfather's funeral, thirty-year-old bachelorDaikichi is floored to discover that the old man had an illegitimatechild with a younger lover! The rest of his family is equally shockedand embarrassed by this surprise development, and not one of them wantsanything to do with the silent little girl, Rin. In a fit of angryspontaneity, Daikichi decides to take her in himself! But will livingwith this overgrown teenager of man help Rin come out of her shell? Andhang on, won't this turn of events spell doom for Daikichi's love life?!
author: Yumi Unita
